message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.SI. 

The paper deals with Natural Language Processing and Computational Argumentation, which are core topics in the subfield of Computational Linguistics (cs.CL). The use of machine learning tools to predict controversiality also suggests a connection to Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI). The analysis of textual context and content analysis of articles are techniques commonly used in Information Retrieval (cs.IR). The use of a dataset and the evaluation of results suggest a connection to Machine Learning (cs.LG). Finally, the focus on social applications suggests a connection to Social and Information Networks (cs.SI).
